info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 6:01PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hamilton County through 630 PM EDT... At 600 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wells, or 11 miles south of Speculator, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Speculator, Wells, Sacandaga Campground, Gilmantown, Girards Sugarbush, Griffin and Blackbridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized poor drainage flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
